item.title: Deporting Anti-American Foreigners Isn’t About Speech Rights. They Don’t Have The ‘Right’ To Be Here At All
item.description: No foreigner has the 'right' to be in America.

item.title: National Review Is Indistinguishable From A Leftist Rag On ‘Signal Gate’
item.description: The National Review has become what it once crusaded against — an outlet parroting leftist talking points.

item.title: Washington Post Writer Shares Deep Compassion For Deported Shirtless Gang Members
item.description: Whenever Democrats wonder to themselves why their party is so unpopular with voters, they should immediately read the hysterical piece written this we...

item.title: The D.C. Swamp’s Bid To Take Out Hegseth Is A Disgrace
item.description: The real reason leftists are gunning for Hegseth's resignation has nothing to do with their fake Signalgate concerns.

item.title: Sources: Milwaukee Officials Handle Ballots In Secret Back Rooms With No Observer Access
item.description: Milwaukee's election director threatened to remove observers with "police powers," as city workers handle ballots unsupervised.
